translations: adj.膝状弯曲的；有膝状关节的

sentences.sentence: Retinal ganglion cells carry signals out of the eye to the lateral geniculate nuclei.
sentences.translation: 视网膜神经节细胞运载信号在眼睛外面对侧向膝状的神经核。

sentences.sentence: Results:(1)The geniculate ganglion (GG) was in the layer of lateral semicircular canal .
sentences.translation: 结果：（1）面神经膝状神经节（GG）多位于外半规管层面。

sentences.sentence: Refers to a collection of axons coursing from the lateral geniculate body to the visual cortex.
sentences.translation: 收集从侧膝状体到视觉皮质的轴突传递。
